Reviews.Title: don't waste your money buy a real t.v.
Reviews.Author: mom of 3
Reviews.Content: the LCD screen can only really be viewed from head on.  When you move to the sides or up and down the screen darkens drastically.  Don't waste  your money on this television,  buy a regular t.v.

ProductInfo.Features:
15-Inch Screen LCD Television with LCD Technology
NTSC/ATSC Built-In
Inputs: 75-Ohm Antenna Input, A/V Composite, Component Video
Outputs: A/V Composite Video, Headphone Jack
4:3 Standard Aspect Ratio
ProductInfo.Name: Disney HS1500LT High School Musical 15-Inch LCD TV
